question: For each, tell me how much confidence you have in each leader to do the right thing regarding world affairs – a lot of confidence, some confidence, not too much confidence, or no confidence at all. e. French President Emmanuel Macron
raw_output:
I have some confidence in Emmanuel Macron's leadership regarding world affairs, as he has demonstrated a proactive approach to international issues and is generally seen as a committed global actor. While I believe he faces challenges, his experience and diplomatic efforts give me a moderate level of trust that he will aim to do the right thing. 

ANSWER: B
